name: Deputy Beagle¹
descriptions: Deputy Beagle is the deputy of Primm in 2281.
Beagle was deputized by Sheriff McBain about two and half months
The deputy is not treated seriously by the other denizens of Primm, on account of his lack of common sense, intelligence, and general usefulness.
At the conclusion of the quest My Kind of Town, regardless of who becomes the new sheriff, he loses the rank of deputy sheriff, or in his own words becomes "just a Beagle."

topics.response_text: Thank you so much.{(gentlemanly)}
And depart we will!
Don't leave me here too long. I can't wait forever.
I just hope I won't have to use it!
What do you need?
Why, yes I am. It's a pleasure to meet you.{(gentlemanly)}

topics.topic_text: I didn't cut you loose so you could run away. Stick with me!
topics.response_text: Oh, that's so gracious of you, to offer to bodyguard me like that? But I'd only slow you down. See you outside!

topics.topic_text: Like I cut you loose just so you could run away? Like I don't want your help?
topics.response_text: [FAILED] I know! It's incredibly generous and altruistic{alter-istic}of you. See you outside!

topics.topic_text: Sure, run away. You don't look like you'd be much help.
topics.response_text: Then I'll defer to your superior appraisal of character and prowess in contests of arms and see you outside!
{sighs}I wonder what it's like to be able to "get going" whenever you like.{(gentlemanly)}
Oh that's just marvelous. I think I'll be making my way outside now. The air's a little close in here.{(gentlemanly)}
No need to rush on my account. I lost feeling in my hands and legs hours ago.{(gentlemanly; tied up, unable to move)}

topics.topic_text: That's right - you SHOULD thank me.
topics.response_text: Well, thank you{emphasis}so much, so{emphasis}very much, for ruining my life.
{Edited Line}My problem is that I'm no longer a deputy. I'm just a Beagle now.

topics.topic_text: What are you talking about? You're the sheriff now!
topics.response_text: Oh no! I'm just the deputy. And I can't be a deputy without a sheriff. It's called chain of command!
But - but the town doesn't have a Sheriff! I don't have an employer, and that means I don't have a job.

topics.topic: BeagleSheriffNeededPC asks about the Sheriff's qualifications
topics.topic_text: What are the qualifications for a Sheriff?
topics.response_text: It should be someone brave like you, but more of a homebody. Someone who'll settle down and watch over us.

topics.topic: BeagleSheriffNoPC declines to find Primm a new sheriff
topics.topic_text: I don't have time to help Primm.
topics.response_text: I know what it's like to have a busy schedule, but surely you can squeeze this in.
I do thank you so kindly for your efforts.

topics.topic: BeagleSherrifYesPC agrees to find a new Sheriff
topics.topic_text: I'll help bring law and order back to Primm.
topics.response_text: You will? That's just marvelous! I'll start thinking up questions for the interview!
I've told you Powder Gangers everything I know! Please don't hit me anymore!{Terrified}

topics.topic: PrimmNashDialoguePrimmJohnsonNashTopic004What about Primm Slim? Could he be sheriff?
topics.topic_text: Do you think Primm Slim could be sheriff?
topics.response_text: Well I reckon he could be a sheriff if you have the skills to reprogram him.
{Edited Line}{Speaking in Audio Log/Journal}This is most unusual! The Powder Gangers have visitors today. I guess there's a first for everything!

topics.topic: VMS02AnyNPCAboutNCRAny idea what the NCR's up to in Primm?
topics.topic_text: Do you know if the NCR has any plans to attack the prison north of here?
topics.response_text: I would certainly hope that someone should handle it! Not that they tell me anything.

topics.topic_text: What are you doing in here?
topics.response_text: Well, a deputy isn't much good without a sheriff.{cowardly and hesitant}So I figured I'd come in here and protect these good people until someone finds us a new one.

topics.topic_text: I hear you may have information on some Khans that came through here with a guy in a checkered suit.
topics.response_text: {Edited Line}Indeed I do good sir, and I would be thrilled to share that information with you as soon as I am released from captivity.

topics.topic_text: You can tell me or you can rot in here.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Well, you look to be the trustworthy sort. Okay, I'll tell you what I know.
